member.name: T:Name_Sorter.Program
member.summary: Gets a text file containing names and sort the name into a list.

member.name: M:Name_Sorter.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Defines the entry point of the application.
member.param: This application accepts only one argument the Input file

member.name: M:Name_Sorter.Program.generateList(System.String)
member.returns: Generates a list of names based on the data on the input file

member.name: M:Name_Sorter.Program.displaySortedList(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Displays the sorted list on the screen.
